summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs is in need of transformation and should address longstanding management challenges that we currently highlight on our High Risk List . Since 2000, we have made more than 1,200 recommendations to improve management and operations at VA, and VA has implemented approximately 70% of them. Implementing the remaining recommendations could significantly improve VA’s operations and improve the care provided to...
title: Veterans Affairs: Sustained Leadership Needed to Address High-Risk Issues
